definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: Finally, some advices in the design of unsymmetrically loaded double-arch tunnel are given.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對偏壓連拱隧道的設計提出了一些建議。

sentences.english: This is the resistor on which the negative bias is developed.
sentences.chinese: 這是在其上面產生負偏壓的電阻器。

sentences.english: May be relative to the bias connection to the remote parts to maintain.
sentences.chinese: 可相對於連接件向遠端偏壓保持件。

sentences.english: The positive-going signal subtracts from the forward bias of the lower transistor.
sentences.chinese: 正向信號則使它的正向偏壓減弱。

sentences.english: Notice that this is no more complicated than the fixed bias example.
sentences.chinese: 注意到這並不比固定偏壓的例子複雜。

sentences.english: Avalanche photodiode APD bias circuit generated.
sentences.chinese: 雪崩光電二極管APD的偏壓產生電路。

sentences.english: The portal is apparently eccentric with the left side buried deeper than the right side.
sentences.chinese: 洞口段左側埋深較右側大，存在明顯的偏壓。
